title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 June 2015 - XWiki
content:
<OSIMasson> has quit  
00:50 <Sorinello\_\_> has quit  
01:51 <woshilapin> has quit  
01:52 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
06:00 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
06:03 <Denis> has quit  
06:55 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:06 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:47 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:48 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <[d\_\_d]> has quit  
09:04 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:07 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:10 <[d\_\_d]> has joined #xwiki  
09:22 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
09:23 <ol-ow2> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <vmassol> good morning  
09:27 <vmassol> it's now really too late for an RC :(  
09:27 <vmassol> we're 4 days after the official release date and we're only 2 working days of the final release date  
09:28 <vmassol> since 7.2 is going to be a large release with nested spaces, we should not start it later than the 8th  
09:28 <vmassol> so maybe we need to do a final release, skipping the RC?  
09:54 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:56 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
09:56 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki

10:23 <gsmeria> has quit  
10:23 <Enygma`1> has joined #xwiki  
10:29 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:00 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <Enygma`1> has quit  
11:29 <KermitTheFragger> hi all  
11:29 <KermitTheFragger> the "add new entry" in the "app within minutes" application, which right/acl governs that?  
11:38 <mflorea> KermitTheFragger, see https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes-ui/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/LiveTableViewSheet.xml#L66  
11:39 <mflorea> #set($hasCreateData = $hasCreatePage)  
11:39 <mflorea> and $hasCreatePage is defined here https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/templates/xwikivars.vm#L18  
11:40 <tmortagne> so edit right at application space level  
11:40 <mflorea> yes :)  
11:41 <tmortagne> application data space level (since there is also an application code space)  
11:41 <vmassol> Hi everyone, no comment on the 7.1RC1 vs 7.1final stuff I posted this morning?  
11:42 <tmortagne> there has been big things introduced in 7.1RC1 so I feel that skipping it would not be very nice  
11:43 <KermitTheFragger> tmortagne: I can only get the "edit application" button to show for users  
11:43 <KermitTheFragger> how do i get to the data space level of the app?  
11:44 <tmortagne> when you are on application home page go to the space admin  
11:44 <tmortagne> and then to the right setup  
11:44 <tmortagne> and check what you have there  
11:44 <KermitTheFragger> rightt thats it, thanks :)  
11:44 <mflorea> @vmassol: I agree with tmortagne, a few days of testing the RC1 are needed  
11:45 <KermitTheFragger> i was totally in the wrong pages  
11:49 <gsmeria> has quit  
11:49 <Trefex> has quit  
11:50 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki

12:08 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki

12:49 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
13:01 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
13:07 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:11 <MasterPiece> has joined #xwiki  
13:29 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
13:38 <ol-ow2> has quit  
13:42 <ol-ow2> has joined #xwiki  
13:43 <Trefex> has quit  
14:18 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
14:22 <Trefex> has quit  
14:24 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
14:27 <vmassol> tmortagne mflorea: what's your proposal for the release?  
14:27 <vmassol> knowing that the 8th is the final and we should not go beyond that date  
14:27 <vmassol> and knowing that RC1 is still not released!  
14:28 <vmassol> I don't see how releasing RC1 will give us more testing time  
14:29 <vmassol> it will actually give us less time  
14:29 <vmassol> (because of the time to release)  
14:29 <vmassol> the only way to get more testing time is to delay the final release but that's what we don't want/need  
14:30 <vmassol> starting Monday we all need to be thinking about Nested Spaces!  
14:30 <vmassol> we're going on a race against the clock...  
14:32 <vmassol> (we need to put all the chances on our side)  
14:32 <tmortagne> vmassol: all we are saying is that you are proposing to put big new thing in a final release, if it's impossible to release 7.1 final later than 8 then I don't really see what we can propose...  
14:32 <vmassol> eaxctly  
14:33 <vmassol> if you want to properly test RC1 you need at least 1 week which we cannot afford  
14:33 <tmortagne> also don't forget that we create a branch when releasing a RC1 so anybody can start working on nested space before 7.1 final if he does not have any task for 7.1  
14:34 <tmortagne> mflorea: did you had time to look at WYSIWYGEditorConfigTest.testEnablePlugin ?  
14:34 <woshilapin> has quit  
14:34 <vmassol> so my proposal is: 1) release 7.1 final without a RC on Monday at latest 2) let the community test it and 3) release a 7.1.1 later on if we find blockers.  
14:34 <tmortagne> mflorea:  it looks like a flickering, just a very frequent one  
14:34 <vmassol> this allows the dev team to start focusing on nested spaces  
14:35 <vmassol> if we push 7.1 by one week we also pish the start of nested psaces by ones week  
14:35 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
14:36 <tmortagne> again I don't see why, it's not because 7.1 final is not released that everyone is stuck working on 7.1 stuff  
14:36 <vmassol> who's doing the release?  
14:36 <vmassol> who's needed first on nested spaces?  
14:36 <tmortagne> who's going to release 7.1.1 when get find a blocker ?  
14:36 <vmassol> we need you thomas :)  
14:37 <vmassol> and everyeon else FTM  
14:37 <vmassol> because we need to brainstorm quickly about lots of stuff  
14:37 <tmortagne> i'm the release manager for the next release anyway, called 7.1RC1 or 7.1 final I'm going to have to do a release anyway  
14:39 <vmassol> in any case we're 4 days late and I haven't seen any proposal for the new date of RC1 nor the final  
14:40 <vmassol> and we know we should not have delayed the 7.1  
14:40 <vmassol> so you're proposing to move 7.1 final to 15th?  
14:44 <tmortagne> vmassol: right now I'm waiting for mflorea to tell me what he found when looking at WYSIWYGEditorConfigTest.testEnablePlugin to finally start the release  
14:44 <vmassol> sure but we need to plan ahead too  
14:44 <tmortagne> as for the 7.1 final IMO we need 1 week after 7.1RC1  
14:44 <vmassol> so that's roughly the 15th  
14:45 <vmassol> so during this one additoinal week we just wait for users to report issues?  
14:45 <vmassol> and in the meantime we work on nested spaces?  
14:49 <tmortagne> vmassol: it also give time to msmeria to test it for example, and yes anyone who don't have something to finish or fix has no reason to not start working on nested spaces  
14:49 <vmassol> ok I'll send a mail then  
14:49 <vmassol> thanks  
14:49 <cjd> triple-negative  highfive  
14:50 <tmortagne> could not stop  
14:50 <cjd> :)  
14:53 <msmeria> has quit  
14:55 <vmassol> mail sent  
15:03 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
15:10 <OSIMasson> has quit  
15:11 <Trefex> has quit  
15:27 <mflorea> tmortagne: I commited a possible fix for the flickering test  
15:28 <tmortagne> mflorea: but it's just a flickering right, nothing blocker to fix on runtime side ?  
15:28 <mflorea> yep, nothing blocker  
15:28 <tmortagne> ok  
15:29 <mflorea> I think the test reloads the page before the AJAX save call is done and thus it doesn't get the expected changes  
15:29 <mflorea> with my change it should wait for the page to be saved and then reload  
15:32 <tmortagne> moving home and will start the mave/git release in 30min  
15:37 <tmortagne> has quit

17:21 <tmortagne> don't forget to merge your fixed in stable-7.1.x  
17:23 <tmortagne> 7.1 jobs created in jenkins

17:30 <vmassol> ah yes I cn

20:13 <vmassol> hey hi Sorinello\_ :)  
20:19 <Sorinello\_> Hello vmassol :)  
20:19 <vmassol> how are you? hope you're doing good!  
20:20 <vmassol> nice to see you here even if it was probably a typo :)  
20:20 <Sorinello\_> I'm good, thanks :) Yeah, it wasn't a typo, just a wrong window :))  
20:20 <vmassol> :)  
20:20 <vmassol> still using xwiki?  
20:27 <debajit> has joined #xwiki  
20:31 <Slashman> has quit  
20:32 <Sorinello\_> no, last time I used it about one year ago  
20:32 <vmassol> ok!  
20:32 <vmassol> doing programming?  
20:32 <vmassol> (are you coding nowadays?)  
20:32 <[d\_\_d]> has quit  
20:33 <vmassol> oopss, haven't noticed the time, I need to go to my tennis training! Have fun and enjoy life! was nice talking to you  
20:34 <vmassol> has quit  
20:34 <[d\_\_d]> has joined #xwiki  
20:37 <xwikiorg\_guest\_3> has joined #xwiki  
20:37 <xwikiorg\_guest\_3> Hello everyone, I've got a question concerning the XAR format  
20:39 <xwikiorg\_guest\_3> I am writing code to turn a mediawiki XML into a XAR that can be imported into Xwiki, my challenge is that I can't find an xsd to validate my output  
20:39 <xwikiorg\_guest\_3> Do you know if there is a formal definition of the XML inside the XAR? if so could you please let me know where I can find it? thank you!
